name: Fallen London: The Thing That Came in from the Fog
storyline: An uninvited visitor appears in the fog. He seeps into your lodgings and occupies the bathtub; he spills crumbs on your carpet and tea on your favourite chair. What does this fog-man want – and how can you get him to leave? And why is he so fixated on chess?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2021.
